titles: Copy of two holograph letters under the deceast Viscount of Stormonts hand, which (besides several others) prove, that the rights acquired by the said Viscount on the estate of Annandale Murray, were in trust for the behove of Sir Robert Murray alias Creichton.
notes: Letters (both London) dated June, 19 1666 and September, 25 1666.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
